body:
Can y'all make a comic where it's about Sakura and Naruto is like out and about doing a mission or something and she's home alone masturbating and sucking her own big tits
Maybe add hinata or tsunade for some. Yuri action

they didnt complete coloring it. its actually starting to piss me off that people color have the doujin and never finish the coloring. just finish the whole thing. and what makes it worse is that if the doujin is short they still dont finish coloring it. something can be 15 pages and they will do only 7 and post it. if your not going to finish coloring them then dont post them half colored. its dumb.
